reviews.review_content:
Kinget's a great teacher; he does a good job of explaining the material and his workload is very reasonable. The class is on a high curve, as most intro classes are. There's a weekly lab that's scheduled for 3 hours, but generally you'll finish after 1-2. The homework is reasonable, as well. There are 3 "midterms", all of which are reasonable and are on a decentreview_content. review_content the previous years' midterms, as the ones he gives are of nearly the same format.
Workload:
3 relatively easy midterms, reasonable weekly homework, a weekly lab (lab assigments are required to be finished in the lab, so there's really no extra homework there), and a curved, harder final
